help.Game Scores Comment: Number of mines minus the number of flags; access to Hall of Fame
help.New Game Comment: Start a new game with current settings
help.Playing Hint: Explore the minefield by clicking a few cells.
help.Flagging Paragraph: Flag a suspected mine using a longer click. The cell will then not respond to normal clicking.
help.Finalise Game: You loose the game when you touch a mine. You win when the number of closed cells equal the number of mines.
help.Keyboard Notice: On desktop or laptop the game could be played using the keyboard. You can reach all interactions using the Tab and Shift+Tab keystrokes.
help.Game Navigation: Navigate the minefield with the arrow keys and flag a mine with the spacebar. Confirm a dialog with enter on the right button.

settings.Will destroy current game: When adapting the game changes along

dialog.Erase Scores?: Do you want to clear the score list?
dialog.Quit and new game?: Do you want to start a new game?
dialog.Quit and restart game?: Do you want to restart the game?
dialog.Quit Game?: Change of a determining game variable. Do you want to end the game?
